author: amartelli
body:
This PR adds a (track) seeded iteration in the TICL 

* Add a SeedingProducer
- track seeded: propagate tracks to the first HGCAL layer and save entry point and direction
- global for self-seeded: 2 regions, one for each z-side

* Doublets finding: 
- for each seeding region, loop over the 2dcl in the tiles in the proper window
- save the seed information in the Doublet and only consider pairs with same seed
- doublet pointing criteria updated to point to the track entry direction (track-seeded) or 0,0,0 (self-seeded) 

* Propagate the information of the seed to the trackster saved in the event, the information is in the form of ProductID (collection) and int (index in the collection)

* Add iteration track-seeded in the python sequence

@felicepantaleo, @rovere
title: HGCAL TICL  seeded iteration
